column2: 1-1-A to HQ. Objective one complete. Over.
1-1-A to HQ. We have now finished with objective two. Over.
1-1-A to HQ. Final objective, completed. Over.
1-1-A to HQ. We have arrived the pre-set hideout. 1-1-A out.
HQ to 1-1-A. Roger, proceed with caution. Over.
HQ to 1-1-A. Very well, good job. Now go hiding. Over.
HQ to 1-1-1A. Your mission is now complete. Proceed as planned. HQ out.
